summary: A pastor with a shady past moves into a rural town just after the Civil War.
cast: Van Heflin|Joanne Woodward|Philip Carey|Raymond Burr|Allison Hayes|Myron Healey|Nancy Kulp|James Griffith|Richard Webb|Kathryn Givney|Robert Burton|Emile Avery|John Cason|Cecil Combs|Juney Ellis|Herman Hack|Signe Hack|Jimmy Hawkins|Susie Hawkins|Ed Hinton|Whitey Hughes|Michael Jeffers|Ethan Laidlaw|Adrienne Marden|Mary Marlo|Jimmy Noel|Jack Parker|Steve Raines|Vince Townsend Jr.|Jean Willes
title: Cuenta hasta tres y reza
